response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will bring substantial value to you. For this unique opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $15,000. This price includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure seamless integration into your workflow. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and your team.", "product_price": 15000}
